title: Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban pack on the PDA as they snuggle up at hotel opening in Tampa
text:
Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban were among the stars who attended the grand opening of the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino Tampa, following its $720 million dollar expansion project.

They had an extra-special bonus when they got to take in the high-flying exploits of skywalking stars Nik Wallenda and his mother Delilah Wallenda, who performed a high-wire walk between the old and new hotel towers.

And Kidman and Urban couldn't have been more excited as they stared up into the sky to watch the duo in action Thursday afternoon.

Loved-up in Sunshine state: Nicole Kidman and husband Keith Urban were among the stars who attended the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino Tampa opening, following its $720 million dollar expansion project

Keeping it casual-cool, but still very fashionable, Kidman wore dark blue jeans with a white blazer over a light orange blouse for the event.

During the ceremony she added a pair of dark sunglasses to help her get the best look at the two daredevil experts.

Much of the time, she stood behind her husband, with both hands on his shoulders as he also looked up to soak-in the high-wire performance.

High-flying excitement: The couple got to take in the high-flying exploits of skywalking stars Nik Wallenda and his mother Delilah Wallenda, who performed a high-wire walk between the old and new hotel towers on Thursday afternoon

Beaming: Kidman, 52, stood behind her husband as they both looked up into the sky to soak-in the high-wire performance

Passionate: Filled with excitement, the Academy Award-winner consistently hugged her man

High drama: As the high-wire duo was getting close to pulling off their stunt, the country star raised his hands into the air in approval

Major props: When each of the performers made it to safety, the crowd stepped-up it's wild enthusiasm and Kidman and Urban gave a thumbs-up

He too wore a pair of dark shades, along with faded black jeans, white t-shirt and a bleached-out blue denim jacket.

At times the Academy-Award-winning actress could be seen hiding her eyes in excited fright as the duo walked the tightrope.

As the performance was wrapping-up, the couple clapped, cheered, and hugged each other in appreciation of the duo's death-defying feat.

When each of the performers made it to safety, the crowd stepped-up it's wild enthusiasm and Kidman and Urban gave a thumbs-up in approval.

Shining stars: The couple also helped ramp-up the electricity when they walked the red carpet

Headlining: Urban will also perform to a sold-out crown on Friday

The couple also helped ramp-up the electricity when they walked the red carpet along with the likes of Christie Brinkley, Kim Zolciak-Biermann, rappers Big Boi and DJ Jazzy Jeff and Brody Jenner, who also served as DJ set at the pool party.

Urban will also perform to a sold-out crown on Friday.

The festivities also included a performance by dance troupe Light Balance in the event center, according to the Tampa Bay Times.

Kidman and Urban have been married since June 2006.
description: Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban packed on the PDA as they cheered on a skywalking duo at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino expansion opening in Tampa, Florida on Thursday..
